item.description: Website Blog posts Work through backlog of unfinished - posts (reprioritize if necessary): substantially complete: business data cleaning artist network notebook (start data science mini project series?) task scheduling sci kit learn custom transformer mostly ideas: multi armed bandits in experiments (contextual bandits) design based inference causal survival analysis (business data potential application) Website improvements add website analytics (Plausible?
